name: bookstore-fullstack
description: > Projeto de estudo para desenvolvimento Backend (Express) e Frontend (Next.js) com foco em TDD, Clean Architecture e DevOps (Docker).

scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -f && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker:hard-reset: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -a --volumes -f
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec api npx prisma generate
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec api npx prisma db seed
scripts.test: docker compose exec api npx vitest

author: Drummonds
